org.eclipse.persistence.json.bind.internal.serializer

Class JsonbDateFormatter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.persistence.json.bind.internal.serializer.JsonbDateFormatter

  • public class JsonbDateFormatter
extends java.lang.Object
    Formatter wrapper for different types of dates.
